messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2285
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/25/2002 11:48:18 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Check out the National Home Education s special website area just for military
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/25/2002 11:48:18 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> In a message dated 8/25/02 2:08:04 AM, fetteroll@... writes:
>
> << > NO NO NO!!!!!! Joyce! Why on earth would you think the military has
> any
> say
> > over the education and lives of the children of military members? And oh
> my
> > gosh, what a horrible thing THAT could be. >>

Check out the National Home Education's special website area just for
military homeschoolers - there are some things military homeschoolers should
know.....
nhen.org and click on the dropdown menu "homeschooling help" and on Military
Homeschoolers.

This is a policy memorandum from the DOD Educational Activity about
homeschooling.
<A HREF="http://www.odedodea.edu/foia/iod/pdf/99-C-001.pdf">http://www.odedodea.edu/foia/iod/pdf/99-C-001.pdf</A>

National Home Education Network
http://www.NHEN.org
Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
